edu.jhu.zpalmer2.spring2009.ai.hw6.algorithm

Interface SimulationBasedReinforcementLearningAgent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReinforcementLearningAgent, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetricTrackingAgent, QLearningAgent

    public interface SimulationBasedReinforcementLearningAgent
extends ReinforcementLearningAgent
    This interface is implemented by those agents which require a simulator in order to iterate their learning functions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<? extends SimulatorListener> getSimulatorListeners()
      Retrieves the listeners that this agent needs to be applied to a simulator whenever it executes a pass.
      void setSimulator(Simulator simulator)
      Provides a simulator for the agent to use.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.jhu.zpalmer2.spring2009.ai.hw6.algorithm.ReinforcementLearningAgent

        duplicate, getPolicy, iterate

    • Method Detail

      • setSimulator

        void setSimulator(Simulator simulator)
        Provides a simulator for the agent to use.
        Parameters:
        simulator - The simulator for the agent to use in its next iteration.

      • getSimulatorListeners

        java.util.Set<? extends SimulatorListener> getSimulatorListeners()
        Retrieves the listeners that this agent needs to be applied to a simulator whenever it executes a pass.
        Returns:
        The listeners which will be applied to any simulator using a policy from this agent.
